name: Chess Engine
description:
This Chess Engine is being written by me just for fun to study Artificial Intelligence, Obfuscation and Optimization Techniques, and to beat some of my friends at chess using programming! Please try it and let me know if there are any bugs, and provide your feedback on my social pages to help me improve it.

How to play?

Select the piece you want to play. That square would turn grey. Now select the square where you want to place it.

Acknowledgements

I started my chess program from the content available at Chess Programming Wiki and Bluefeversoft. Special Thanks to them for their content and tutorials about writing a chess engine.

The above chess program is copyrighted by Shubham Ramdeo, along with the pixel chess pieces. You have to take my permission before using the images or the code.
